sentences.en: " Well, well! We must needs talk thus in the daytime!
sentences.cn: “ 好啦, 好 啦 ,我们在这光天化日之下是得这么讲话!

sentences.en: " Well, what's more dangerous than coming here in the daytime!
sentences.cn: “ 再说, 哪里还有比大白天来这儿更危险的事呢?

sentences.en: a skit on daytime TV programmes
sentences.cn: 戏评日间电视节目的幽默短文

sentences.en: Bats sleep in the daytime and come out to hunt for food at night.
sentences.cn: 蝙蝠白天睡觉,而夜间出来觅食.

sentences.en: Can I take your daytime telephone number (= the number of the telephone you use during the day ) ?
sentences.cn: 你能把你的日间电话号码给我吗？

sentences.en: Daytime television tended to remind her too forcefully of her own situation.
sentences.cn: 日间电视节目往往使她深刻地认识到自身的境况。

sentences.en: During the daytime he carried rocks with the other workers.
sentences.cn: 白天他和其他工人一道运[抬]石头.

sentences.en: Even at the end of the war, German factories mainly operated only in daytime.
sentences.cn: 即使在战争末期，德国工厂也基本上只在白天开工。

sentences.en: He slept badly at night and couldn't concentrate in class at daytime.
sentences.cn: 他夜里睡不好,白天上课时思想开小差.

sentences.en: I feel to be fed up inside the small vehicle whole daytime.
sentences.cn: 我整日坐在车子里感到厌倦了.

sentences.en: In the daytime he stayed up in his room, sleeping, or listening to music.
sentences.cn: 他白天呆在自己的屋子里睡觉或听音乐。

sentences.en: That is why you can't see the stars at daytime.
sentences.cn: 那就是你在白天看不到星星的原因.

sentences.en: The instrument is used when fly overwater in the daytime.
sentences.cn: 那仪器是在白天飞越水域时使用的.

sentences.en: The mountains appeared far different in the night than in the daytime.
sentences.cn: 白天,这些山跟晚上丝毫不同.

sentences.en: They won't hender us from digging there in the daytime. "
sentences.cn: 咱们白天到那儿去挖,他们不会碍事的. ”

sentences.en: We left in the daytime so as not to arouse suspicion.
sentences.cn: 我们在白天离开以避免引起怀疑。

trans.tran_cn: (工作日的电视或广播节目)白天播出的

trans.tran_en: the time during the day between the time when it gets light and the time when it gets dark
